com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.burstly.html.ormma.listener
Class AccelListener

java.lang.Object
  com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.burstly.html.ormma.listener.AccelListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
SensorEventListener
public class AccelListener
extends Object
implements SensorEventListener

The listener interface for receiving accelerometer events. The class that is interested in processing a accelerometer event implements this interface, and the object created with that class is registered with a component using the component's addAccelListener method. When the accel event occurs, that object's appropriate method is invoked. AccelEvent
